entries.title: Become an expert in Artificial Intelligence with Microsoft Learn
entries.description: In this article, I will explain the main services and share Microsoft Learn resources with you so you can use them and become a Microsoft AI expert.

entries.title: Build ChatGPT-like Chatbots With Customized Knowledge for Your Websites, Using Simple Programming
entries.description: Like ChatGPT but in a form that you can plug into your website and expand with any kind of tailored information by combining basic “old-school” NLP with cutting-edge GPT-3.

entries.title: ChatGPT? Stable Diffusion? Generative AI jargon, explained
entries.description: While ChatGPT and text-to-image tools are among the buzziest developments in tech right now, comprehending what they are and how they work can be an exercise in frustration.

entries.title: Festivus: Azure Quantum Feats of Strength
entries.description: I asked our team members for their favorite Azure Quantum feature or a particularly useful tool.

entries.title: Hackers abuse Google Ads to spread malware in legit software
entries.description: I guess I should stop clicking on every advertisement I see

entries.title: IT issues curtail remote workforce productivity
entries.description: I would have posted this sooner, but my network connection was down

entries.title: LastPass password vaults crackable for $100, alleges 1Password
entries.description: Never let an opponents mistake go unnoticed

entries.title: Technology is saving you from profound levels of boredom and it's a problem
entries.description: Something to read if you're not bored

entries.title: The latest issue of Quanta Math and Science (online, free)
Training a Single Output Multilinear Regression Model in PyTorch
entries.description: A neural network architecture is built with hundreds of neurons where each of them takes in multiple inputs to perform a multilinear regression operation for prediction. In the previous tutorials, we built a single output multilinear regression model that used only a forward function for prediction.

entries.title: What to expect from AI in 2023
entries.description: What’s on deck for AI in 2023? Will regulation rein in the worst of what AI brings, or are the floodgates open? Will powerful, transformative new forms of AI emerge, à la ChatGPT, disrupting industries once thought safe from automation?

entries.title: What’s next for AI
entries.description: Get a head start with our four big bets for 2023.
